column5: Had an ear infection for some time now, and finally got to the Specialist after 10 wks. Found the infection is in the inner ear, [i 'blew the ear drum yrs ago] Apparently, once the infection is cleared up, he can operate and restore most of the hearing in that ear. Had a new eardrum put in 25yrs ago but it let go, and they said then,it coud'nt be done again. Thats the GOOD news  The BAD news is I might be able to hear all the Bull that goes on around me!
Just for the record: What was the bad news   :w00t: I think I have a hearing problem  :lol:
Ill have to show that to my wife... lol
WORD TO THE WISE  *** NO CHAT ROOM  ***
Thats great news Jack..I was looking forward to chatting with at lakair and not in the chat room... Joe
What do you mean by that Jed??? Joe
